product_context.title: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White

reviews.productTitle: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White
reviews.text: Many homes in our area are being built with this type of electrical system. This switch, dimmers and outlets are the simplest to replace. It is literally plug and play. No locating and opening the breaker, no wiring to mess with. All is needed is to remove the faceplate, unclip the switch, pop it out, then replace with replacement. I replaced a light switch with a dimmer switch in less than a minute. Downside is, they're a little more expensive than the standard switches, are not available at your local hardware store yet and are not compatible with standard switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2025
reviews.title: Deako switches

reviews.productTitle: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White
reviews.text: I'm thinking about removing all these overpriced Deako switches that came on my home and use something else. You need to lower your prices, if it was cheaper I would have updated all my switches to smart ones. But there is no way I'd do it at this price point. These are not even nice at this price. The switches are very loud. You'll wake the whole household in the morning pressing one of these switches. On another note, the Wi-Fi smart switches get hot.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2025
reviews.title: Super expensive for what it is

reviews.productTitle: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White
reviews.text: The Deako Lighting Simple Dimmer brings sleek, modern convenience to your home lighting system. Whether you’re looking to adjust the ambiance in your living room or fine-tune the lighting in your bedroom, this dimmer switch offers smooth, easy control. It’s perfect for anyone looking for an upgrade from the basic on/off switch to something that lets you set the mood just right. Pros: 1. Sleek & Modern Design: The clean white finish and simple slide switch blend seamlessly into any room décor, adding a touch of sophistication. 2. Easy to Install: With a neutral wire required, the installation process is straightforward and well-suited for anyone with basic wiring knowledge. 3. Versatile Compatibility: Whether you’re working with a 3-way, 4-way, or single-pole setup, this dimmer works across multiple configurations, making it ideal for a variety of uses around your home. 4. Smooth Operation: The dimming action is smooth and responsive, giving you full control over your lighting without any sudden jumps or flickers. 5. Enhanced Control: Adjusting the lighting to the perfect level has never been easier. Ideal for setting the right mood for dinner parties, movie nights, or winding down after a long day. Cons: 1. Neutral Wire Required: The neutral wire requirement may complicate installation for some homes, especially if you’re working with older electrical systems that don’t have this wiring. 2. No Smart Features: While it provides excellent manual control, it doesn’t offer smart connectivity, so you won’t be able to control it from your phone or integrate it with home automation systems. 3. Limited Color Options: It only comes in white, which may not be ideal if you’re looking for a specific color or style to match your existing switches. For anyone looking to add a bit more flexibility to their lighting setup, the Deako Lighting Simple Dimmer delivers in both design and function. It’s a great choice if you’re looking to adjust the brightness with ease while maintaining a modern look in your home!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
reviews.title: Smooth Control, Simple Setup – Deako Lighting Dimmer Switch

reviews.productTitle: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White
reviews.text: Be sure to check out the product immediately, and pursue a return immediately if product is broken. We recently purchased 3 switches. 2 were perfect and easy to install. Love them. Unfortunately the 3rd switch was damaged. After 3 separate customer service chats, we were informed this product only has a 30 day return window, that we missed by 1 day. We had been busy and didn’t get around to installing the switches the first month. We were told to attempt to pursue a warranty claim with the manufacturer for any kind of resolution - which is still pending.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2024
reviews.title: Great switches- disappointing customer service

reviews.text: It works like any other manual dimmer, it just costs 2x as much, however if your house was wired with Deaco switches it’s expensive to change out. This said to be fair the selling point of Deaco is the ability to switch out various switches easily. This is no exception, it took me longer to remove the switch plate than to replace the switch, super super easy. I’m just not sure it’s would be worth it for someone with rudimentary skills.

reviews.productTitle: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White
reviews.text: Over all the switch worked well however it only lasted a little over a year before I started to have issues with it. The switch wouldn't turn very well after a year. As in I would have to forcibly put the switch in the on position multiple times before the light finally turned on. Very frustrating. I do love the brand though just not this particular switch. I ended up swapping it out for the mor experience version of this switch which in my opinion is worth it. I can control the new switch with my voice and ther are more dim setting. If you want a dimmer switch from this company just buy the more expensive one from the start.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.title: OK product
